ygData.subject: RE: Re[2]:Experience and Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: To tell you the truth, I think it s kinda a stupid arguement, there really isn t much you can do about it, you can either play everquest and put up with it, or
ygData.messageBody:
To tell you the truth, I think it's kinda a stupid arguement, there really
isn't much you can do about it, you can either play everquest and put up
with it, or don't play everquest and not have to worry about it. Though I
know there is probably some people out there, that even if they didn't play
everquest, the idea of Twinking would still keep them up at nights. Arguing
about it, whether it is for or against, is counter productive. So get on
with it, and instead of typing flames on the mailing lists, you should be in
the game playing your character. :)

Shelza, Karana

>
>Shando
